name: A Hundred Years of a Tree
name_original: A Hundred Years of a Tree
description:
Description

- Your goal is to prevent The Tree from dying and ensure it is fully grown in 100 years.
- The Tree will grow gradually, the healthier the tree, the faster it grows.

- Every year, a random event will happen:
   - Rain : +30 Healthiness instantly
   - Evil Human : -5 Healthiness every year

Miracle
- To perform miracle, your believers have to make sacrifice
   - [Lightning] - Kill Evil Human
   - [Boost Growth] - Instantly grow The Tree.

Programming
@Hexcolyte

2D Sprites
@Epicload

All UI Elements are credited to Kenny [https://kenny.nl]

This is an entry to Ludum Dare 45

Good Luck!
